fields.label: Date of Inspection
fields.name: date_of_inspection
fields.instructions: Enter the date as written month (no abbreviations) date, year. EG - June 6, 2014

fields.label: NYFC Examiner
fields.name: nyfc_examiner
fields.instructions: Enter your name the way you would like it to appear on the report.

fields.label: NYFC Examiner Signature
fields.name: nyfc_examiner_signature
fields.instructions: Enter your name the way you would like it to appear on the report.

fields.label: Do you want to add notes?
fields.name: do_you_want_to_add_notes
fields.instructions: Select yes to enter any notes or comments concerning your inspection. These will not appear in the PDF report

fields.label: Notes
fields.name: notes
fields.instructions: Enter any notes concerning your inspection. These will not appear in the PDF report. Please date all entries

sub_fields.label: HTML Content
sub_fields.name: html_content
sub_fields.instructions: To enable Search and Replace - add the selected field names inside curly cues.  For example - {address}.

sub_fields.label: Search and Replace
sub_fields.name: fields
sub_fields.instructions:
By selecting these fields you can make it so the text you entered in the HTML field is searched and replaced with these dynamic values.  Just add them to your text like this:  { exmple_field }.  Click the selected field to copy the text to the clipboard.

This will not work for image fields or repeaters.

sub_fields.label: Image
sub_fields.name: image
sub_fields.instructions: This is mainly used for full page images that get added at the end of the PDF

sub_fields.label: Any or all conditions must be true?
sub_fields.name: any_or_all_conditions_must_be_true
sub_fields.instructions:
Select "All" if all conditions must be true.
Select "Any" if any conditions can be true.

sub_fields.label: Conditions
sub_fields.name: conditions
sub_fields.instructions: Add conditions for showing the selected image if needed.

sub_fields.label: Value
sub_fields.name: value
sub_fields.instructions: Select the value that must be true for this condition.

sub_fields.label: Select Image Field
sub_fields.name: image_field
sub_fields.instructions: Select a field if you want images to show at the top of this section.

sub_fields.label: Select Image Field 2
sub_fields.name: image_field_2
sub_fields.instructions: Select a field if you want images to show at the bottom of this section.

sub_fields.label: Alternate Output
sub_fields.name: alternate_output
sub_fields.instructions: This text will show if no other text shows.  Leave blank if you want nothing to show.

sub_fields.label: Text Result
sub_fields.name: text_result
sub_fields.instructions: If all the conditions created are true, this text will show.  To enable Search and Replace - add the selected field names inside curly cues.  For example - {address}.

sub_fields.label: Search and Replace
sub_fields.name: fields
sub_fields.instructions: Select form elements that you'd llike to use search and replace with. Click the selected field to copy the text to the clipboard.

sub_fields.label: Search and Replace
sub_fields.name: fields_doors
sub_fields.instructions: Select form elements that you'd llike to use search and replace with. Click the selected field to copy the text to the clipboard.

fields.label: Form Groups
fields.name: form_groups
fields.instructions: This is used to in the create page navigation.

fields.label: Report Pages
fields.name: report_pages
fields.instructions: This is a list of each page that makes up a complete report.

sub_fields.label: Does self closing door operate properly
sub_fields.name: does_self_closing_door_operate_properly

choices.The Glass is missing from door: The Glass is missing from door
choices.Door Latch has damaged or missing latchi: Door Latch has damaged or missing latching mechanism

choices.IN A FIRE, CLOSE ALL DOORS BEHIND YOU!: IN A FIRE, CLOSE ALL DOORS BEHIND YOU!
choices.STAIRWAY LETTER IS MISSING ON BOTH SIDES: STAIRWAY LETTER IS MISSING ON BOTH SIDES OF THE DOOR
choices.STANDPIPE OUTLET (if Standpipe Riser in: STANDPIPE OUTLET (if Standpipe Riser in this Stairway)
choices.IF LOCKED WHERE IS THE SPARE KEY KEPT: IF LOCKED WHERE IS THE SPARE KEY KEPT
choices.ELECTRICAL METER ROOM - USE NO WATER - N: ELECTRICAL METER ROOM - USE NO WATER - NO STORAGE PERMITTED
choices.GAS METER ROOM - NO STORAGE PERMITTED: GAS METER ROOM - NO STORAGE PERMITTED
choices.STAIRWAY LETTER IS MISSING ON STAIR SIDE: STAIRWAY LETTER IS MISSING ON STAIR SIDE OF THE DOOR
choices.STAIRWAY LETTER IS MISSING ON HALLWAY SI: STAIRWAY LETTER IS MISSING ON HALLWAY SIDE OF THE DOOR
choices.FLOOR NUMBER IS MISSING FROM THE PUBLIC: FLOOR NUMBER IS MISSING FROM THE PUBLIC HALL NEAR THE STAIRS AND WITHIN THE STAIR ENCLOSURE.
FLOOR NUMBER IS MISSING FROM THE PUBLIC HALL NEAR THE STAIRS
choices.FLOOR NUMBER IS MISSING WITHIN THE STAIR: FLOOR NUMBER IS MISSING WITHIN THE STAIR ENCLOSURE

fields.label: Comments
fields.name: building_exterior_comments
fields.instructions: Add any additional comments for this section here.  These comments will show in the report.

fields.label: Building Exterior Images
fields.name: building_exterior_images
fields.instructions: Add any images you'd like to include in this section

sub_fields.label: Image Description
sub_fields.name: image_description
sub_fields.instructions: Add a description.  This will show beneath the image on the report

fields.label: Comments
fields.name: building_exterior_comments
fields.instructions: Add any additional comments for this section here.  These comments will show in the report.

fields.label: Building Exterior Images
fields.name: building_exterior_images_2
fields.instructions: Add any images you'd like to include in this section

sub_fields.label: Image Description
sub_fields.name: image_description
sub_fields.instructions: Add a description.  This will show beneath the image on the report
